Sequence Information.Source: designed, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (68.75%) toKR-12R: 19%, K: 25%.Activity: active against E. faecalis ATCC 10100 or ATCC 19433 (MIC 15.6-31.25 ug/ml). MBC is 62.5 ug/ml.Warning: other bacteria not tested.It inhibited formation of biofilms:bacteria:E. faecalis at 2xMIC. Also showed an effect on pre-formed biofilms.
Literature Information.Author: Vasconcelos MA, da Silva BR, Andrade AL, de Azevedo Pinheiro A, Evaristo FFV, Arruda FVS, Lorenz√≥n EN, Cilli EM, Teixeira EH. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial and Antibiofilm Activity of Synthetic Peptide [W7]KR12-KAEK Against Enterococcus faecalis Strains.
